#  Collection: Activewear

  1. Home
  2. Activewear

Jobst Activewear, a cushioned compression sock, was designed with superior
moisture management and extraordinary softness. These comfortable support
socks are ideal for any activity! Dri- release yarns feel like cotton and
helps keep feet dry and comfortable. Wide comfort band secures sock in place.
Cushioned foot and seamless toe provide all-day wearing comfort! Available in
15-20 mmHg, 20-30 mmHg, and 30-40 mmHg.Show More >

Jobst Activewear, a cushioned compression sock, was designed with superior
moisture management and extraordinary softness. These comfortable support
socks are ideal for any activity! Dri- release yarns feel like cotton and
helps keep feet dry and comfortable. Wide comfort band secures sock in place.
Cushioned foot and seamless toe provide all-day wearing comfort! Available in
15-20 mmHg, 20-30 mmHg, and 30-40 mmHg.
